00037 tool::tool()/*: profile()*/ {
00038   validProfile = false;
00039   profile.Nullify();
00040   type = UNDEFINED;
00041 }
00042 
00043 millTool::millTool() {
00044   shape = UNDEF;
00045   type = ROTARY_TOOL;
00046   dia=0.0;
00047   len=0.0;
00048   revol.Nullify();
00049 }
00050 
00051 const TopoDS_Solid& millTool::getRevol() {
00052   if (revol.IsNull()) {
00053     //gp_Ax1 vertical(gp_Pnt(0,0,0),gp_Dir(0,0,1)); //use gp::OZ() instead
00054     BRepBuilderAPI_MakeFace mkF(gp_Pln(gp::XOY()),profile);
00055     BRepPrimAPI_MakeRevol rev(mkF.Face(),gp::OZ(),M_PI,true);
00056     validRev = rev.IsDone();
00057     if (validRev)
00058       revol = TopoDS::Solid( rev.Shape() );
00059   }
00060   return revol;
00061 }

00063 
00072 //if this doesnt work, try raytracing
00073 // see also OpenCASCADE6.3.0/samples/standard/mfc/12_HLR/src/SelectionDialog.cpp
00074 //Prs3d_Projector (const Standard_Boolean Pers, const Quantity_Length Focus, const Quantity_Length DX, const Quantity_Length DY, const Quantity_Length DZ, const Quantity_Length XAt, const Quantity_Length YAt, const Quantity_Length ZAt, const Quantity_Length XUp, const Quantity_Length YUp, const Quantity_Length ZUp)
00075 const TopoDS_Face& millTool::getProj(degrees deg) {
00076   double zloc = 5; //zloc is z coordinate of projection
00077   Handle(HLRBRep_Algo) myAlgo = new HLRBRep_Algo();
00078   myAlgo->Add(profile);
00079   Prs3d_Projector myProj(false,0, 0,0,zloc, 0,0,1, 0,0,1); //point
00080   myAlgo->Projector(myProj.Projector());
00081   myAlgo->Update();
00082   HLRBRep_HLRToShape aHLRToShape(myAlgo);
00083   TopoDS_Shape Proj = aHLRToShape.VCompound();
00084   return TopoDS::Face(Proj);
00085 }

00089 ballnoseTool::ballnoseTool(double diameter, double length) {
00090   dia = diameter;
00091   len = length;
00092   double r = dia/2.0;
00093   validProfile = false;
00094   Handle(Geom_TrimmedCurve) Tc;
00095   Tc = GC_MakeArcOfCircle (gp_Pnt(r,0,r), gp_Pnt(0,0,0), gp_Pnt(-r,0,r));
00096   TopoDS_Edge Ec = BRepBuilderAPI_MakeEdge(Tc);
00097   TopoDS_Edge E1 = BRepBuilderAPI_MakeEdge(gp_Pnt(r,0,r), gp_Pnt(r,0,length));
00098   TopoDS_Edge E2 = BRepBuilderAPI_MakeEdge(gp_Pnt(-r,0,r), gp_Pnt(-r,0,length));
00099   TopoDS_Edge E3 = BRepBuilderAPI_MakeEdge(gp_Pnt(-r,0,length), gp_Pnt(r,0,length));
00100   BRepBuilderAPI_MakeWire wm(Ec,E1,E2,E3);
00101   if ( wm.IsDone() ) {
00102     profile = wm.Wire();
00103     validProfile = true;
00104     shape = BALLNOSE;
00105     /*
00106     TopoDS_Wire w = wm.Wire();
00107     if ( w.Closed() ) {
00108       BRepBuilderAPI_MakeFace f(w);
00109       if (f.IsDone()) {
00110         profile = f.Face();
00111         validProfile = true;
00112         shape = BALLNOSE;
00113       }
00114     }
00115     */
00116   }
00117 }
